DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Warm ischemia clamp blood vessel without cool kidney . Cold ischemia clamp blood vessel kidney cool . It yet know whether warm ischemia effective cold ischemia patient undergo surgery stage I kidney cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized phase III trial study warm ischemia see well work compare cold ischemia surgery treat patient stage I kidney cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Warm Ischemia Cold Ischemia During Surgery Treating Patients With Stage I Kidney Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine effect warm ischemia partial nephrectomy long-term renal function patient solitary stage I renal cortical tumor normal contralateral kidney . Secondary - Determine degree contralateral kidney compensates damage inflict operate kidney surgery . - Determine 1-year disease-specific overall survival patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo warm ischemia follow partial nephrectomy . - Arm II : Patients undergo cold ischemia follow partial nephrectomy . Blood urine sample collect periodically nephrectomy assess renal function . Patients follow 1 , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 month nephrectomy .
